reason: The operation of a permutation acting on a SET (as opposed to an element) is never defined. The proof claims h_3({1,4}) = {1,4}, but this requires a definition of how permutations extend to sets. The standard definition is σ(S) = {σ(x) : x ∈ S}, but this must be stated explicitly. Without this definition, expressions like h_3({1,4}) are meaningless.
